title: Ebert & Roeper - 03.02.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  March 2nd, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0839980/]Semi-Pro[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0472160/]Penelope[/url]

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0905979/]Chicago 10[/url]
